snippet: Serge Lasvignes, who has little profile in the art world, is a surprise choice to succeed Alain Seban, who has led the modern art museum for eight years.
abstract: Serge Lasvignes, who has little profile in the art world, is a surprise choice to succeed Alain Seban, who has led the modern art museum for eight years.

headline.main: New Leader Nominated for Pompidou Center in Paris
headline.print_headline: New Leader Nominated For Pompidou Center
